meanings.definition: A synthetic corticosteroid used to treat inflammation and allergies.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed triamcinolone to help with my allergies.
meanings.sent2: She bought triamcinolone at the pharmacy for her skin inflammation.
meanings.sent3: I guess my allergies were so bad, even triamcinolone couldn't handle them!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like triamcinolone soothing inflammation.
meanings.sent5: The power of triamcinolone to calm allergies amazed me.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.
meanings.sent1: My friend's dermatologist recommended triamcinolone for her eczema.
meanings.sent2: After using triamcinolone, his psoriasis started to improve.
meanings.sent3: I joked that triamcinolone was like a magic potion for skin problems.
meanings.sent4: Her skin condition vanished as if touched by triamcinolone's magic.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of triamcinolone on skin conditions surprised me.

meanings.definition: A drug that can be injected into joints to reduce inflammation and pain.
meanings.sent1: The athlete received a shot of triamcinolone to ease joint pain.
meanings.sent2: Triamcinolone injections are commonly used for arthritis treatment.
meanings.sent3: I imagined tiny superheroes injecting triamcinolone into my joints to fight inflammation.
meanings.sent4: The relief from pain after the triamcinolone injection felt like a miracle.
meanings.sent5: The way triamcinolone tackles joint inflammation is truly remarkable.
